name: Cave of Souls
description:
Welcome in the nightmare of Cave of Souls!

Cave of Souls is an 8Bits indie arena shooter made by Boundach. You can play now and if you want, post feedback on this page.

Tips:

- You can view commands with "F1" on main menu.

- The hard mode is avalaible with left click on the little monster (title screen).

Thanks and have fun.

You can view the log on my blog (french only).
